long.am,ar,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,lv,:
This extension brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. Press the extension icon to open the active player in the picture in picture mode. This extension automatically tries to use the active player.

Now stream movies, series or sports on any tab. Install Picture in Picture chrome extension to enable the floating video. We support this feature on every streaming site. 

For YouTube, the extension also offers an in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode. You can use this extension to watch YouTube videos in a floating window that is on top of all other windows so tabs can be switched and still the player is visible. 

The floating window has play and pause buttons, and you can exit from the picture-in-picture mode anytime.

What is the Picture-in-Picture mode?
This mode lets you play any video in this mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

How Extension works:
1. Find the video and run it.
2. Click the extension icon to reduce the video player on YouTube and other sites.
3. Select the “Floating Picture in Picture” and you're done.

A floating video allows the viewer to scroll through your webpage and keep your video in view the whole time.

Video Playback Controls
Enjoy full control over your video playback with intuitive controls directly within the floating player:
- Volume control; 
- Stop and play video; 
- Video speed control; 
- Switch to next video.

Just click on the Floating Player and Video Control icon to display the video player on YouTube, Netflix or any other websites on the Web. This window will play the video on all pages of the browser on which there is a video resource.

Pic-in-pic mode supports all video formats and works with popular video hubs like Youtube and many others

We hope you find our tool useful! We are waiting for your feedback and ratings!

You can use this extension to watch YouTube videos in a floating window that is on top of all other windows so tabs can be switched and still the player is visible. 

The floating window has play and pause buttons, and you can exit from the picture-in-picture mode anytime.

What is the Picture-in-Picture mode?
This mode lets you play any video in this mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

Picture-in-Picture - (Floating Player) - allows you to watch videos in a floating window (always on top of other windows) so you can keep track of what you are watching when interacting with other sites or applications.

This mode lets you play any video in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. 

You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

Just click on the Floating Player icon to display the video player on YouTube or any other websites on the Web. This window will play the video on all pages of the browser on which there is a video resource.

What is extension Picture in Picture?
Floating video brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. The extension adds a page action button to your browser. When a page has a video element, the color of this button changes. Press the button to open the active player in the Picture-in-Picture mode (PiP Mode). 

Picture in Picture extension automatically tries to use the active player.

How do I play a video in a floating window?
Open the YouTube video on the mini player in floating image-in-picture (PIP) mode. Supports video players This window will play videos on all pages of the browser. 

How Picture in Picture works: 
- Find the video and run it. 
- Select the “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP) mode, and you're done

A floating video player allows the viewer to scroll through your webpage and keep your video in view the whole time.

PiP mode is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

Play video in floating popup window.
Resize floating video pop-up.
All video formats supported.
Keyboard shortcut: Alt + P (⌥ + P on macOS)

The floating window - PiP mode has play and pause buttons, and you can exit from the picture-in-picture mode anytime.

How Picture in Picture mode works:
1. Find the video and run it.
2. Click the extension icon to reduce the video player on YouTube and other sites.
3. Select the “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP) mode, and you're done.

Try real multitasking with a floating mini player that simplifies your life on the Web! Watch videos in picture-in-picture mode on popular websites.

Pic-in-pic mode supports all video formats and works with popular video hubs like Youtube, Vimeo, Facebook and many others.

Youtube Picture in Picture allows you to play Youtube video content in a floating window pinned always on top, so you can use the rest of your screen for other tasks.

All you need to do is add HBOMax Picture in Picture extension to your browser and enjoy your favorite series in the background. It's as simple as that!

long.ca:
Picture-in-Picture - (Reproductor flotant) - us permet veure vídeos en una finestra flotant (sempre a sobre d'altres finestres) perquè pugueu fer un seguiment del que esteu veient quan interactueu amb altres llocs o aplicacions.

Aquesta extensió ofereix una vista PiP a tots els llocs web amb un element de vídeo HTML. Premeu la icona de l'extensió per obrir el reproductor actiu a la imatge en mode d'imatge. Aquesta extensió intenta utilitzar automàticament el reproductor actiu.

Ara reprodueix pel·lícules, sèries o esports en qualsevol pestanya. Instal·leu l'extensió de Chrome Picture in Picture per habilitar el vídeo flotant. Admetem aquesta funció a tots els llocs de transmissió.

Aquest mode us permet reproduir qualsevol vídeo en mode Picture-in-Picture (PiP) i funciona a totes les plataformes. PiP és un reproductor de vídeo emergent i sempre a la part superior que flota a sobre d'altres finestres.

També podeu reposicionar-lo al llarg de la vora de la pantalla mentre continueu navegant per Internet.

Només cal que feu clic a la icona del reproductor flotant per mostrar el reproductor de vídeo a YouTube o a qualsevol altre lloc web del web. Aquesta finestra reproduirà el vídeo a totes les pàgines del navegador on hi hagi un recurs de vídeo.

Què és l'extensió Picture in Picture?
El vídeo flotant ofereix una vista PiP a tots els llocs web amb un element de vídeo HTML. L'extensió afegeix un botó d'acció de pàgina al vostre navegador. Quan una pàgina té un element de vídeo, el color d'aquest botó canvia. Premeu el botó per obrir el reproductor actiu en el mode Picture-in-Picture (Mode PiP).

L'extensió Picture in Picture prova automàticament d'utilitzar el reproductor actiu.

Com reprodueixo un vídeo en una finestra flotant?
Obriu el vídeo de YouTube al minireproductor en mode d'imatge en imatge flotant (PIP). Admet reproductors de vídeo Aquesta finestra reproduirà vídeos a totes les pàgines del navegador.

Com funciona Picture in Picture:
- Busca el vídeo i executa-lo.
- Seleccioneu el mode "Imatge flotant en imatge" (PIP) i ja heu acabat

Un reproductor de vídeo flotant permet a l'espectador desplaçar-se per la vostra pàgina web i mantenir el vostre vídeo a la vista tot el temps.

El mode PiP és un reproductor de vídeo emergent i sempre a la part superior que flota a sobre d'altres finestres. Porta el mode PIP a qualsevol reproductor de vídeo HTML5 de qualsevol lloc web.

Reprodueix el vídeo a la finestra emergent flotant.
Canvia la mida de la finestra emergent de vídeo flotant.
Admeten tots els formats de vídeo.
Drecera de teclat: Alt + P (⌥ + P a macOS)

La finestra flotant: el mode PiP té botons de reproducció i pausa, i podeu sortir del mode d'imatge en imatge en qualsevol moment.

Com funciona el mode Picture in Picture:
1. Cerqueu el vídeo i executeu-lo.
2. Feu clic a la icona de l'extensió per reduir el reproductor de vídeo a YouTube i altres llocs.
3. Seleccioneu el mode "Imatge flotant en imatge" (PIP) i ja heu acabat.

Proveu la multitasca real amb un mini reproductor flotant que us simplifica la vida al web! Mira vídeos en mode d'imatge en imatge en llocs web populars.

El mode Pic-in-pic admet tots els formats de vídeo i funciona amb centres de vídeo populars com Youtube, Vimeo, Facebook i molts altres.

Exempció de responsabilitat: sobre la marca registrada de Youtube!
Youtube és una marca comercial de Google Inc. L'ús d'aquesta marca comercial està subjecte als permisos de Google.
El mode d'imatge flotant en el mode d'imatge (PIP) per a YouTube no està creat, no està associat a Google Inc. o no és compatible.

Exempció de responsabilitat: Hulu és una marca comercial de Disney Media and Entertainment Distribution. Aquest lloc web i extensió no tenen cap associació ni afiliació amb Hulu o cap empresa de tercers.

Youtube Imatge en imatge
Youtube Picture in Picture us permet reproduir contingut de vídeo de Youtube en una finestra flotant fixada sempre a la part superior, de manera que podeu utilitzar la resta de la pantalla per a altres tasques.

Tot el que heu de fer és afegir l'extensió HBOMax Picture in Picture al vostre navegador i gaudir de la vostra sèrie preferida en segon pla. És tan senzill com això!

AppleTV+ Picture in Picture us permet reproduir contingut de vídeo en una finestra flotant fixada sempre a la part superior, de manera que podeu utilitzar la resta de la pantalla per a altres tasques.

Ampliar el vídeo, canviar la relació d'aspecte del vídeo eliminant barres negres a Netflix, Youtube. Vídeo ultra ample, pàgina de zoom, controlador de zoom, vídeo de velocitat i descàrrega de vídeos. Zoom de vídeo. Zoom per omplir el vídeo i canviar la relació d'aspecte del vídeo eliminant barres negres a Youtube. Vídeo del controlador de zoom i vídeo de resum Chatgpt. Imatge en mode d'imatge.

Video Speed Controller: accelera o alentiu els vídeos a qualsevol web.
Video Speed Controller activat més ràpid o més lent per reproduir vídeo. Ara podeu alentir o accelerar fàcilment els vídeos amb una configuració flexible.

Esperem que la nostra eina sigui útil! Esperem els vostres comentaris i valoracions!
long.cs:
Obraz v obraze – (Plovoucí přehrávač) – umožňuje sledovat videa v plovoucím okně (vždy nad ostatními okny), abyste měli přehled o tom, co sledujete při interakci s jinými weby nebo aplikacemi.

Toto rozšíření přináší zobrazení PiP na všechny webové stránky s prvkem videa HTML. Stisknutím ikony rozšíření otevřete aktivní přehrávač v režimu obrázek v obrázku. Toto rozšíření se automaticky pokusí použít aktivní přehrávač.

Nyní streamujte filmy, seriály nebo sporty na libovolné kartě. Chcete-li povolit plovoucí video, nainstalujte si rozšíření Picture in Picture pro Chrome. Tuto funkci podporujeme na všech streamovacích stránkách.

Tento režim vám umožňuje přehrávat jakékoli video v režimu Obraz v obraze (PiP) a funguje na všech platformách. PiP je vyskakovací, vždy zapnutý video přehrávač, který se vznáší nad ostatními okny.

Můžete jej také přemístit podél okraje obrazovky, zatímco budete pokračovat v procházení internetu.

Kliknutím na ikonu plovoucího přehrávače zobrazíte přehrávač videa na YouTube nebo na jiných webových stránkách na webu. Toto okno přehraje video na všech stránkách prohlížeče, na kterých je zdroj videa.

Co je rozšíření Obraz v obraze?

This extension brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. Press the extension icon to open the active player in the picture in picture mode. This extension automatically tries to use the active player.

Enhance Your Video Viewing Experience with Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome

Are you tired of pausing your videos to check emails or scroll through social media? Do you wish you could multitask while watching your favorite content? Look no further than the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome.

Introduction:

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is a powerful tool that enhances your video viewing experience by allowing you to watch your favorite content while you multitask. With this extension, you can keep your videos playing in a small, resizable window while you work on other tasks.

Subheading: Easy Installation and Setup

Installing and setting up Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is quick and easy. Simply go to the Chrome Web Store, search for the extension, and click "Add to Chrome." Once installed, the extension will be available in the toolbar for easy access.

Subheading: Seamless Video Viewing

The Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome allows you to seamlessly watch your favorite content without interruptions. Whether you're working on a document or browsing the web, your video will play in the corner of your screen, so you can keep an eye on it while you work.

Subheading: Customizable Viewing Experience

With the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome, you can customize your video viewing experience to suit your preferences. You can resize the window to make it larger or smaller, move it around your screen, and even adjust the opacity to make it more or less visible.

Subheading: Improved Productivity

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome can improve your productivity by allowing you to multitask while watching videos. Whether you're watching a tutorial, a webinar, or a conference, you can keep the video playing while you work on other tasks, without missing any important information.

Subheading: Compatible with Major Video Platforms

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is compatible with major video platforms, including YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion. You can use this extension to watch any video, whether it's a movie, a TV show, or a tutorial.

Subheading: Protect Your Privacy

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is designed to protect your privacy. The extension does not collect any personal data or browsing history, so you can use it with confidence.

Subheading: Dual Video and PiP Mode

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome allows you to view dual videos in PiP mode, making it easier to watch multiple videos simultaneously. You can view two videos side by side with the floating window, making it easier to compare or multitask.

Subheading: Multi Video and Floating Player

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome also lets you view multi-videos in a floating player, which makes it easier to watch videos from multiple sources. The floating window can be moved around your screen, so you can watch your videos while working on multiple screens.

Subheading: Picture and Picture and Side by Side Video

With Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome, you can view Picture and Picture, or side by side video, making it easier to compare and contrast videos. You can watch multiple videos simultaneously without having to switch back and forth between tabs.

Conclusion:

In conclusion, the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is a must-have tool for anyone who wants to enhance their video viewing experience. With its easy installation and setup, seamless video viewing, customizable options, improved productivity, compatibility with major video platforms, and privacy protection, this extension is a game-changer for video lovers. Give it a try today and see how it can transform the way you watch videos.

Enhance Your Video Viewing Experience with Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome

Are you tired of pausing your videos to check emails or scroll through social media? Do you wish you could multitask while watching your favorite content? Look no further than the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome.

Introduction:

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is a powerful tool that enhances your video viewing experience by allowing you to watch your favorite content while you multitask. With this extension, you can keep your videos playing in a small, resizable window while you work on other tasks.

Subheading: Easy Installation and Setup

Installing and setting up Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is quick and easy. Simply go to the Chrome Web Store, search for the extension, and click "Add to Chrome." Once installed, the extension will be available in the toolbar for easy access.

Subheading: Seamless Video Viewing

The Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome allows you to seamlessly watch your favorite content without interruptions. Whether you're working on a document or browsing the web, your video will play in the corner of your screen, so you can keep an eye on it while you work.

Subheading: Customizable Viewing Experience

With the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome, you can customize your video viewing experience to suit your preferences. You can resize the window to make it larger or smaller, move it around your screen, and even adjust the opacity to make it more or less visible.

Subheading: Improved Productivity

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome can improve your productivity by allowing you to multitask while watching videos. Whether you're watching a tutorial, a webinar, or a conference, you can keep the video playing while you work on other tasks, without missing any important information.

Subheading: Compatible with Major Video Platforms

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is compatible with major video platforms, including YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion. You can use this extension to watch any video, whether it's a movie, a TV show, or a tutorial.

Subheading: Protect Your Privacy

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is designed to protect your privacy. The extension does not collect any personal data or browsing history, so you can use it with confidence.

Subheading: Dual Video and PiP Mode

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome allows you to view dual videos in PiP mode, making it easier to watch multiple videos simultaneously. You can view two videos side by side with the floating window, making it easier to compare or multitask.

Subheading: Multi Video and Floating Player

Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome also lets you view multi-videos in a floating player, which makes it easier to watch videos from multiple sources. The floating window can be moved around your screen, so you can watch your videos while working on multiple screens.

Subheading: Picture and Picture and Side by Side Video

With Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome, you can view Picture and Picture, or side by side video, making it easier to compare and contrast videos. You can watch multiple videos simultaneously without having to switch back and forth between tabs.

Conclusion:

In conclusion, the Picture-in-Picture Extension for Chrome is a must-have tool for anyone who wants to enhance their video viewing experience. With its easy installation and setup, seamless video viewing, customizable options, improved productivity, compatibility with major video platforms, and privacy protection, this extension is a game-changer for video lovers. Give it a try today and see how it can transform the way you watch videos.

Picture-in-Picture - (플로팅 플레이어) - 플로팅 창(항상 다른 창 위에 있음)에서 비디오를 볼 수 있으므로 다른 사이트나 애플리케이션과 상호 작용할 때 보고 있는 내용을 추적할 수 있습니다.

이 확장은 HTML 비디오 요소가 있는 모든 웹사이트에 PiP 보기를 제공합니다. 확장 아이콘을 눌러 PIP 모드에서 활성 플레이어를 엽니다. 이 확장 프로그램은 자동으로 활성 플레이어를 사용하려고 시도합니다.

이제 어느 탭에서나 영화, 시리즈, 스포츠를 스트리밍하세요. 플로팅 비디오를 활성화하려면 Picture in Picture 크롬 확장 프로그램을 설치하세요. 우리는 모든 스트리밍 사이트에서 이 기능을 지원합니다.

이 모드를 사용하면 PiP(Picture-in-Picture) 모드에서 모든 비디오를 재생할 수 있으며 모든 플랫폼에서 작동합니다. PiP는 다른 창 위에 떠 있는 팝업 방식의 항상 상단에 표시되는 비디오 플레이어입니다.

인터넷 서핑을 계속하는 동안 화면 테두리를 따라 위치를 변경할 수도 있습니다.

플로팅 플레이어 아이콘을 클릭하기만 하면 YouTube나 웹의 다른 웹사이트에 비디오 플레이어를 표시할 수 있습니다. 이 창은 비디오 리소스가 있는 브라우저의 모든 페이지에서 비디오를 재생합니다.

확장 PIP(Picture in Picture)란 무엇입니까?
플로팅 비디오는 HTML 비디오 요소가 있는 모든 웹사이트에 PiP 보기를 제공합니다. 확장 프로그램은 브라우저에 페이지 작업 버튼을 추가합니다. 페이지에 비디오 요소가 있으면 이 버튼의 색상이 변경됩니다. 버튼을 누르면 Picture-in-Picture 모드(PiP 모드)에서 활성 플레이어가 열립니다.

Picture in Picture 확장 프로그램은 자동으로 활성 플레이어를 사용하려고 시도합니다.

부동 창에서 비디오를 어떻게 재생합니까?
플로팅 PIP(image-in-picture) 모드로 미니 플레이어에서 YouTube 비디오를 엽니다. 비디오 플레이어 지원 이 창은 브라우저의 모든 페이지에서 비디오를 재생합니다.

PIP(Picture in Picture) 작동 방식:
- 영상을 찾아 실행해 보세요.
- "PIP(Floating Picture in Picture)" 모드를 선택하면 완료됩니다.

플로팅 비디오 플레이어를 사용하면 시청자가 웹페이지를 스크롤하고 비디오를 내내 볼 수 있습니다.

PiP 모드는 다른 창 위에 떠 있는 팝업형 항상 상단 비디오 플레이어입니다. 모든 웹사이트의 모든 HTML5 비디오 플레이어에 PIP 모드를 가져옵니다.

플로팅 팝업창에서 영상을 재생합니다.
플로팅 비디오 팝업 크기를 조정합니다.
모든 비디오 형식이 지원됩니다.
키보드 단축키: Alt + P(macOS에서는 ⌥ + P)

부동 창 - PiP 모드에는 재생 및 일시 정지 버튼이 있으며 언제든지 PIP 모드를 종료할 수 있습니다.

PIP(Picture in Picture) 모드 작동 방식:
1. 영상을 찾아 실행해 보세요.
2. YouTube 및 기타 사이트의 비디오 플레이어를 축소하려면 확장 아이콘을 클릭하십시오.
3. "PIP(Floating Picture in Picture)" 모드를 선택하면 완료됩니다.

웹 생활을 단순화시켜주는 플로팅 미니 플레이어로 진정한 멀티태스킹을 경험해 보세요! 인기 웹사이트에서 PIP(Picture-in-Picture) 모드로 비디오를 시청하세요.

Pic-in-pic 모드는 모든 비디오 형식을 지원하며 Youtube, Vimeo, Facebook 등과 같은 인기 있는 비디오 허브에서 작동합니다.

면책 조항: Youtube 상표에 대해!
Youtube는 Google Inc.의 상표입니다. 이 상표의 사용에는 Google의 허가가 적용됩니다.
YouTube용 사진 모드(PIP)의 플로팅 이미지 모드가 생성되지 않았거나 Google Inc.와 연결되지 않았거나 지원되지 않습니다.

면책조항: Hulu는 Disney Media and Entertainment Distribution의 상표입니다. 이 웹사이트 및 확장 프로그램은 Hulu 또는 제3자 회사와 아무런 연관이나 제휴를 맺지 않습니다.

귀하가 해야 할 일은 브라우저에 HBOMax Picture in Picture 확장 프로그램을 추가하고 좋아하는 시리즈를 백그라운드에서 즐기는 것뿐입니다. 그것은 그렇게 간단합니다!

AppleTV+ 화면 속 화면
AppleTV+ Picture in Picture를 사용하면 항상 상단에 고정된 부동 창에서 비디오 콘텐츠를 재생할 수 있으므로 화면의 나머지 부분을 다른 작업에 사용할 수 있습니다.

Netflix, Youtube에서 비디오를 확대하고 화면비를 변경하여 검은색 막대를 제거합니다. 울트라와이드 비디오, 줌 페이지, 줌 컨트롤러, 스피드 비디오 및 비디오 다운로더. 비디오 줌. YouTube에서 비디오를 채우고 화면 비율 비디오를 변경하여 검은색 막대를 제거합니다. 줌 컨트롤러 영상 및 요약 영상 Chatgpt. PIP 모드.

비디오 속도 컨트롤러 - 모든 웹에서 비디오 속도를 높이거나 낮춥니다.
비디오 속도 컨트롤러를 사용하면 비디오를 더 빠르게 또는 느리게 재생할 수 있습니다. 이제 유연한 구성으로 비디오 속도를 쉽게 낮추거나 높일 수 있습니다.

우리 도구가 도움이 되길 바랍니다! 우리는 여러분의 피드백과 평가를 기다리고 있습니다!

This mode lets you play any video in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. 

You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

Just click on the Floating Player icon to display the video player on YouTube or any other websites on the Web. This window will play the video on all pages of the browser on which there is a video resource.

What is extension Picture in Picture?
Floating video brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. The extension adds a page action button to your browser. When a page has a video element, the color of this button changes. Press the button to open the active player in the Picture-in-Picture mode (PiP Mode). 

Picture in Picture extension automatically tries to use the active player.

How do I play a video in a floating window?
Open the YouTube video on the mini player in floating image-in-picture (PIP) mode. Supports video players This window will play videos on all pages of the browser.

- Find the video and run it. 
- Select the “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP) mode, and you're done

A floating video player allows the viewer to scroll through your webpage and keep your video in view the whole time.

All video formats supported.
Keyboard shortcut: Alt + P (⌥ + P on macOS)

2. Click the extension icon to reduce the video player on YouTube and other sites.

Picture-in-Picture - (Zwevende speler) - stelt u in staat video's in een zwevend venster te bekijken (altijd bovenop andere vensters), zodat u kunt bijhouden wat u bekijkt wanneer u met andere sites of applicaties communiceert.

Deze extensie brengt een PiP-weergave naar alle websites met een HTML-video-element. Druk op het extensiepictogram om de actieve speler in de beeld-in-beeldmodus te openen. Deze extensie probeert automatisch de actieve speler te gebruiken.

Stream nu films, series of sport op elk tabblad. Installeer de Chrome-extensie Picture in Picture om de zwevende video in te schakelen. We ondersteunen deze functie op elke streamingsite.

In deze modus kun je elke video afspelen in de Picture-in-Picture (PiP)-modus, en deze werkt op alle platforms. PiP is een uitklapbare videospeler die altijd op de voorgrond staat en boven andere vensters zweeft.

U kunt hem ook langs de schermrand verplaatsen terwijl u op internet blijft surfen.

Klik gewoon op het pictogram van de zwevende speler om de videospeler op YouTube of andere websites op internet weer te geven. Dit venster speelt de video af op alle pagina's van de browser waarop een videobron aanwezig is.

Wat is de extensie Picture in Picture?
Zwevende video brengt een PiP-weergave naar alle websites met een HTML-video-element. De extensie voegt een paginaactieknop toe aan uw browser. Wanneer een pagina een video-element bevat, verandert de kleur van deze knop. Druk op de knop om de actieve speler in de Picture-in-Picture-modus (PiP-modus) te openen.

De Picture in Picture-extensie probeert automatisch de actieve speler te gebruiken.

Hoe speel ik een video af in een zwevend venster?
Open de YouTube-video op de minispeler in de zwevende beeld-in-beeld-modus (PIP). Ondersteunt videospelers. Dit venster speelt video's af op alle pagina's van de browser.

Hoe Beeld in Beeld werkt:
- Zoek de video en voer deze uit.
- Selecteer de modus "Zwevend Picture in Picture" (PIP) en u bent klaar

Met een zwevende videospeler kan de kijker door uw webpagina scrollen en uw video de hele tijd in beeld houden.

De PiP-modus is een uitklapbare videospeler die altijd op de voorgrond staat en boven andere vensters zweeft. Breng de PIP-modus naar elke HTML5-videospeler op elke website.

Speel video af in een zwevend pop-upvenster.
Formaat van zwevende videopop-up wijzigen.
Alle videoformaten worden ondersteund.
Sneltoets: Alt + P (⌥ + P op macOS)

Het zwevende venster - de PiP-modus heeft afspeel- en pauzeknoppen en u kunt de beeld-in-beeld-modus op elk gewenst moment afsluiten.

Hoe de Picture in Picture-modus werkt:
1. Zoek de video en voer deze uit.
2. Klik op het extensiepictogram om de videospeler op YouTube en andere sites te verkleinen.
3. Selecteer de “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP)-modus en je bent klaar.

Probeer echte multitasking met een zwevende minispeler die uw leven op internet vereenvoudigt! Bekijk video's in de beeld-in-beeld-modus op populaire websites.

De Pic-in-pic-modus ondersteunt alle videoformaten en werkt met populaire videohubs zoals YouTube, Vimeo, Facebook en vele anderen.

Picture-in-Picture – (Reprodutor Flutuante) – permite assistir vídeos em uma janela flutuante (sempre em cima de outras janelas) para que você possa acompanhar o que está assistindo ao interagir com outros sites ou aplicativos.

Esta extensão traz uma visualização PiP para todos os sites com um elemento de vídeo HTML. Pressione o ícone da extensão para abrir o player ativo no modo imagem em imagem. Esta extensão tenta usar automaticamente o player ativo.

Agora transmita filmes, séries ou esportes em qualquer guia. Instale a extensão Picture in Picture do Chrome para ativar o vídeo flutuante. Oferecemos suporte a esse recurso em todos os sites de streaming.

Este modo permite reproduzir qualquer vídeo no modo Picture-in-Picture (PiP) e funciona em todas as plataformas. PiP é um reprodutor de vídeo sempre visível que flutua sobre outras janelas.

Você também pode reposicioná-lo ao longo da borda da tela enquanto continua navegando na Internet.

Basta clicar no ícone do Player Flutuante para exibir o player de vídeo no YouTube ou em qualquer outro site da Web. Esta janela irá reproduzir o vídeo em todas as páginas do navegador em que exista um recurso de vídeo.

O que é extensão Picture in Picture?
O vídeo flutuante traz uma visualização PiP para todos os sites com um elemento de vídeo HTML. A extensão adiciona um botão de ação de página ao seu navegador. Quando uma página possui um elemento de vídeo, a cor deste botão muda. Pressione o botão para abrir o player ativo no modo Picture-in-Picture (Modo PiP).

A extensão Picture in Picture tenta automaticamente usar o player ativo.

- Encontre o vídeo e execute-o.
- Selecione o modo “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP) e pronto

Todos os formatos de vídeo suportados.

3. Selecione o modo “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP) e pronto.

O modo Pic-in-pic suporta todos os formatos de vídeo e funciona com hubs de vídeo populares como Youtube, Vimeo, Facebook e muitos outros.

This extension brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. Press the extension icon to open the active player in the picture in picture mode. This extension automatically tries to use the active player.

Now stream movies, series or sports on any tab. Install Picture in Picture chrome extension to enable the floating video. We support this feature on every streaming site. 

For YouTube, the extension also offers an in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode. You can use this extension to watch YouTube videos in a floating window that is on top of all other windows so tabs can be switched and still the player is visible. 

The floating window has play and pause buttons, and you can exit from the picture-in-picture mode anytime.

Youtube Picture-in-Picture - (Floating Player) - allows you to watch videos in a floating window (always on top of other windows) so you can keep track of what you are watching when interacting with other sites or applications.

This mode lets you play any video in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. 

You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

Just click on the Floating Player icon to display the video player on YouTube or any other websites on the Web. This window will play the video on all pages of the browser on which there is a video resource.

What is extension Picture in Picture?
Floating video brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. The extension adds a page action button to your browser. When a page has a video element, the color of this button changes. Press the button to open the active player in the Picture-in-Picture mode (PiP Mode). 

Picture in Picture extension automatically tries to use the active player.

How do I play a video in a floating window?
Open the YouTube video on the mini player in floating image-in-picture (PIP) mode. Supports video players This window will play videos on all pages of the browser. 

How Picture in Picture works: 
- Find the video and run it. 
- Select the “Floating Picture in Picture” (PIP) mode, and you're done

A floating video player allows the viewer to scroll through your webpage and keep your video in view the whole time.
